alert.note: Alert for Elliott; Menifee; Morgan; Powell; Rowan; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 3:17PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Powell, northwestern Morgan, eastern Menifee, southeastern Rowan, northwestern Wolfe and southwestern Elliott Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 316 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Valeria, or 7 miles north of Campton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pomeroyton, Stoll, Maytown, Mariba and Toliver around 320 PM EDT. Wellington, Ezel, Denniston and Murphyfork around 325 PM EDT. Artville, Korea, Dan, Pekin, Scranton, Mize and Grassy Creek around 330 PM EDT. Henry, Kellacey, Ebon, Omer, Twentysix, Big Woods, Woodsbend and New Cummer around 335 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include West Liberty, Zag, Yocum, Dehart, Bangor, Licking River, Liberty Road, Blaze, Leisure, Wrigley, Craney, Paragon, Blairs Mills, Pomp, Lick Branch, Lick Fork and Pelfrey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Elliott; Menifee; Morgan; Powell; Rowan; Wolfe
